title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of a 200 OK response with no content.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
EB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download and extract Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start Tomcat 7 without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
4. Verify that the server returns an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK.
